post.description: Fetch a personalized banner for recommendation.

get.description: Fetch active placements of the page.

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: The client ID of the placement owner.

sessionId.description: The session starts when the customer visits the store. It persists until the customer closes the tab, browser or app.

deviceId.description: The device identifier should be unique for each device. A customer can have multiple devices.

customerId.description: The customer identifier which is generated and managed by the store. The store should configure `frontApi` parameter of ADCIO SDK so that the `customerId` can be sent to ADCIO API.

placementId.description: Identifier for the placement which the suggestion will be placed.

placementPositionX.description: The X coordinate of the placement in pixel.

placementPositionY.description: The Y coordinate of the placement in pixel.

fromAgent.description: Whether the request is from the ADCIO agent or not. Default value is `false`.

sessionId.description: The session starts when the customer visits the store. It persists until the customer closes the tab, browser or app.

deviceId.description: The device identifier should be unique for each device. A customer can have multiple devices.

customerId.description: The customer identifier which is generated and managed by the store. The store should configure `frontApi` parameter of ADCIO SDK so that the `customerId` can be sent to ADCIO API.

placementId.description: Identifier for the placement which the suggestion will be placed.

placementPositionX.description: The X coordinate of the placement in pixel.

placementPositionY.description: The Y coordinate of the placement in pixel.

fromAgent.description: Whether the request is from the ADCIO agent or not. Default value is `false`.

excludingProductIds.description: Product IDs(on store) that should NOT be included in the suggestion.

baselineProductIds.description: Product IDs(on store) that support the fixed baseline suggestion.

categoryId.description: The category id(on store) for filtering adsets.
